> [{quoted}](name=Big Black Croc,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=BHBOsQjA,comment-id=000b00000000,timestamp=2017-12-07T00:37:38.073+0000)
>
> _<Removed by Moderation>_

There is no need to become abusive; it's a meme thread on Memes & Games, there will be memes. I get that you might not enjoy certain Boards users or topics, but if you don't like someone, do not join their discussion intentionally to be a jerk to them. There is actually an option for hiding boards and/or specific users from your page, please use it if you like, but if you don't do not seek people out to treat like this; [Boards Enhancement Kit (BEK)](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion/U8uw8k1l-boards-enhancement-kit)

However, I have to note that BEK does not allow blocking of Boards moderators, such as Laughing Fish. You can hide the M&G board though, but otherwise I recommend just not clicking on his threads.

Was just saying my opinion that I hate the guy. And I didn't know laughing fish posted this because I never look at the names.he's annoying that's all I'm saying. This might no be a serious thread but The Paff Legacy posted a serious comment, so the least you can do is not be a dick and reply with a comment just to annoy him or don't reply at all just because your upvote farming. He does this shit in gameplay post to, so if thers no actual way to block him then I guess I'm doomed to see this guy and his cringey memes
you targeted him saying you hate the guy followed by I didn't know it was him.... I can't seem to follow the logic behind this post.

um....your "opinion" involved various insults for no reason. if you hate the guy so much wouldn't be smart to simply avoid his posts? I mean if you click on his posts because you didn't look at the names that's on you, not anyone else's _<Removed by moderation>_

I commented in an attempt to stop him from spamming memes and take shit seriously once in a while. But your probably right that I am being a dick.its just kinda hard to ignore his post when I see them everyday with no option to block.

the thing is, is that it's not your place to decide what another should post and what one should not post. If someone want's to post nothing but memes they got the right. (that's why we have a meme's & games section) 

seriously if it bothers you just pay attention to the names and simply avoid the posts. also want to see what board section the post comes from as that would give you an idea as to what the post is.

Dude, have you actually read any of the posts on Varus?
Yes
So, what do you think of it? Cause I don't think that Pepe's rage face is entirely accurate. I guess because comedy, but.... I don't know, they seem to be pretty reasonable.
Its pretty civil discussion as the original thread. The comment section eeehhhhh. Either way, none of the boards members are down for this change.

Yeah, and I kind of feel had for Riot one this. I mean, people were already weary when the new bio was leaked, and Riot pumped-out a lot of money on it. A well-done video and two comics (of admittedly good quality). 

I just wished it was for someonenew, cause me and a lot of other people liked old Varus.

It really made no sense of them to change the entire character just to have a gay one in the game. We don't need this kind of political activism in a game like this. It's just throwing in unnecessary heat for a thing no one asked for.
